about_the_game:
BECOME AN ALTERBORN



VENTURE INTO THE SHATTERED LANDS



ALTERBORN is set in a grim, lawless world permeated with death and destruction, corrupted by an antediluvian force. You’re an Alterborn, one of the last survivors that eluded demise at a terrible cost. Through the eyes of some, you are no longer human but rather an abomination corrupted by something unknown that is slowly taking over. Constantly tempted by the allure of Phantom power, will you cling to your humanity or delve into the dark nature of your inner self?

ONE OF A KIND, FOREBODING WORLD

Embark on a dangerous journey, roaming a vast, bizarre wasteland filled with otherworldly fauna and flora, unlike anything you have ever seen before and uncover all its mysteries. The world is steeped in dark humor and does not play by any rules. Most of the time.

INTRINSIC BATTLE OF TWO NATURES

All progression systems reflect the duality of being an Alterborn, forcing you to constantly make difficult but meaningful choices. Fine-tune your playstyle by embracing the power of the Phantom and acquiring powerful new abilities or preserve your Humanity, mixing and matching countless unlockables such as varied, extraordinary guns, armors and traits.

FORGE AND BREAK FRAIL ALLIANCES

Your actions do matter and impact the world around you. The Shattered Lands are a brutal, unforgiving place of no heroes, just survivors willing to do whatever it takes to live another day. Will you trust anyone in this crazed, unstable world or use them for your own ends only to discard them when the time is right? The choice is yours.

UNIQUE FEATURES:


  • ALTERED STATE
    Explore handcrafted Metroidvania-style levels with your surroundings changing in real time before your very eyes. Some parts of the world have been completely engulfed by the Plague, creating a conduit between life and death: the Altered State. As an Alterborn, you’re able to shift into and out of this otherworldly dimension filled with mysteries and roamed by dreadful Phantoms.



  • PHANTOM FORM
    Embrace the Plague, unleashing the power within and temporarily transforming into an all-powerful Phantom, completely changing your playstyle and gaining access to a plethora of abilities that will greatly aid you in combat. But beware, as you succumb to being a Phantom, your humanity slowly slips away.



  • CORRUPTION
    The Plague consumes everything it touches, leaving its mark in the form of Corruption. Alterborn gameplay systems are all inherently dualistic, enforcing the player fantasy of being slowly but steadily corrupted by an unnatural force. You can choose to combat the Plague by cleansing the world around you or pursue its power by corrupting your gear, upgrading your Phantom Form and more.

    Learn More:

content_descriptors.notes: Alterborn contains strong violence, blood and gore, profanity and use of legal drugs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7350K (4.20 GHz) or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 470 with 2 GB dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated Direct X 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (3.70 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated Direct X 11 compatible soundcard

short_description: In this unique Soulslike Shooter, you're an Alterborn - a survivor marked by a mysterious plague. The Shattered Lands stand before you, foreboding and unforgiving. Will you forsake your humanity or do your best to preserve it?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
